Package managers

Class SettingsManager

java.lang.Object
managers.SettingsManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Publisher
public class SettingsManager extends Object implements Publisher
Class that handles all settings relevant for the app.
Since:
22.06.2020.
Author:
Dimitrije Karanfilovic

  • Method Details

    • loadSettings

      public boolean loadSettings()
      Function that loads all relevant settings. notifyObservers() is called if the loading was successful
      Returns:
      indicator whether the loading was successful

    • saveSettings

      public void saveSettings​(String lookAndFeel, int x, int y, String language)
      Function that saves settings.
      Parameters:
      lookAndFeel - current LookAndFeel
      x - frame's x coordinate
      y - frame's y coordinate
      language - current language

    • addInitialSettings

      public void addInitialSettings​(String lookAndFeel, int x, int y, String language)
      Function that saves initial settings.
      Parameters:
      lookAndFeel - initial LookAndFeel
      x - frame's initial x coordinate
      y - frame's initial y coordinate
      language - initial language

    • updateLocale

      public void updateLocale​(String language)
      Function that updates app's language. notifyObservers() is called.
      Parameters:
      language - language's code

    • getWord

      public String getWord​(String key)
      Function that fetches word from the current language's resource file.
      Parameters:
      key - word's key in the resource file from languages package.
      Returns:
      desired word
